name: Shotgun Night
description:
Monsters have awaken and are coming for your tombstone. Fend them off with your trusty shotgun and ghostly abilities. CONTROLS: Arrow Keys:Move & AimZ:Jump / Ball CancelX:Shoot / Tackle HOW TO PLAY:

Defend your tombstone from the monsters by either shooting them, or tackling them. (Both with X) If you need to get back to the ground, you can jump (Z) to return without bouncing up again. Survive as many waves as you can.
